channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Magento
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Magento

item.title: CVE-2020-3718|2024-08-04T07:44:50.128Z -- adobe -- magento
item.description: Magento versions 2.3.3 and earlier, 2.2.10 and earlier, 1.14.4.3 and earlier, and 1.9.4.3 and earlier have a security bypass vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2020-3717|2024-08-04T07:44:50.245Z -- adobe -- magento
item.description: Magento versions 2.3.3 and earlier, 2.2.10 and earlier, 1.14.4.3 and earlier, and 1.9.4.3 and earlier have a path traversal vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to sensitive information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2020-3715|2024-08-04T07:44:50.273Z -- adobe -- magento
item.description: Magento versions 2.3.3 and earlier, 2.2.10 and earlier, 1.14.4.3 and earlier, and 1.9.4.3 and earlier have a stored cross-site scripting vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to sensitive information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2020-3758|2024-08-04T07:44:50.361Z -- adobe -- magento
item.description: Magento versions 2.3.3 and earlier, 2.2.10 and earlier, 1.14.4.3 and earlier, and 1.9.4.3 and earlier have a stored cross-site scripting vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to sensitive information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2020-3719|2024-08-04T07:44:50.246Z -- adobe -- magento
item.description: Magento versions 2.3.3 and earlier, 2.2.10 and earlier, 1.14.4.3 and earlier, and 1.9.4.3 and earlier have an sql injection vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to sensitive information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2020-3716|2024-08-04T07:44:50.042Z -- adobe -- magento
item.description: Magento versions 2.3.3 and earlier, 2.2.10 and earlier, 1.14.4.3 and earlier, and 1.9.4.3 and earlier have a deserialization of untrusted data vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution.
